sentences.en: Application of reformer topped oil at the millisecond furnace in Lanzhou Petrochemical Company is expounded.
sentences.cn: 介绍了重整拔头油在兰州石化公司毫秒炉装置的应用情况.

sentences.en: Many designers and operators require such paint on their secondary reformer shells.
sentences.cn: 有些设计者和操作者需要在二段转化炉外壳涂以此种油漆.

sentences.en: THE CALCULATION OF TEMPERATURE DISTRIBUTION OF A REFORMER IN THREE - DIMENSIONAL SPACE ( BY MONTE CARLO METHOD )
sentences.cn: 转化炉三维空间温度分布计算 ( 蒙特卡罗法 )

sentences.en: The reformer and ideologist Zheng Guanying was the exponential.
sentences.cn: 郑观应是这一思想的积极倡导者.

sentences.en: The structure, material, strength calculation and welding seam structure of pre reformer are introduced.
sentences.cn: 介绍了预转化炉的结构 、 选材 、 强度计算及焊缝结构.

sentences.en: Therefore, the total sulfur shall be controlled before the feed enters the reformer.
sentences.cn: 因此在原料进入转化炉之前需对总硫加以控制.

sentences.en: This article summarizes the experience in operation and maintenance of steam reformer and its overhaul method.
sentences.cn: 归纳总结了蒸汽转化炉的操作维护经验和停炉检修方法.

少年管教所；妓女教养所

改革家；改革运动者；改良者

trans.tran_cn: 改革者，改良者，选举法修正论者
trans.tran_en: someone who works to improve a social or political system
